SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler

Klasse TaskScheduler

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler.TaskScheduler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
SchedulerInterface
public final class TaskScheduler extends Object implements SchedulerInterface
A custom task scheduler. The
ungültiges @link 
{@link this#tick()
} method needs to be called in a bukkit task every tick. The purpose of this class is to provide a custom task scheduler so that you don't need to remove tasks manually from the bukkit scheduler. You can for example integrate this scheduler inside a gamemode class, and as soon as the gamemode has ended, all tasks are gone because the
ungültiges @link 
{@link this#tick()
} method if this scheduler is no longer called.

    • scheduleRepeatingTask

      public long scheduleRepeatingTask(@NotNull @NotNull TaskRunnable runnable, long delay, long interval, @Nullable Task.RemoveCondition removeCondition, @Nullable @Nullable String label)
      Schedules a repeating task.
      Angegeben von:
      scheduleRepeatingTask in Schnittstelle SchedulerInterface
      Parameter:
      runnable - the runnable that should be executed
      delay - the initial delay (the amount of ticks to wait until the task will run the first time)
      interval - the interval (the amount of ticks to wait before the task runs again after the last execution)
      removeCondition - the condition the task should be stopped and removed
      label - task label
      Gibt zurück:
      task id
